Beta APP
Core Products
Concentrated Liquidity Market Maker
CLMM allows liquidity providers to set specific price ranges and add single-sided liquidity. It will redefine the capital efficiency and trading depth on Solana.
LP NFT Farming
A special gift from Crema. The non-fungible liquidity contributed by liquidity providers are eligible to earn extra rewards from Crema's LP NFT Farming.
Integrated Aggregators
Crema is mutually integrated with influential aggregators on Solana such as Jupiter, which helps all users to easily access the full liquidity within the ecosystem.
Our Edges
Unparalleled Capital Efficiency
CLMM delivers 10-50x higher capital efficiency than the common AMM model does on Solana.
